about.me: We are passionate about solving real world problems with technology. For the Cardano project our drive is: I) Running a secure, transparent and high performance node II) Educating the community and bringing together great minds III) Making a positive impact on the world through technology
about.server: Infastructure set up with multiple relays distributed across: 1. Amsterdam | dedicated cloud server | 8GB RAM - 4 CPUs - 2GB/s 2. Frankfurt | dedicated cloud server | 8GB RAM - 4 CPUs - 2GB/s 3. Harare | dedicated cloud server | 8GB RAM - 4 CPUs - 2GB/s
